dct_title_s: Plan of the new town of Halifax in Nova Scotia
dct_description_sm: Abstract: Map of Halifax, Nova Scotia, showing fortifications.
Notes: Detached from the October 1749 issue of: The gentleman's magazine. London : Printed by E. Cave, jun.
Includes text of pages 439-440 (both sides) and "Explanation" (index to buildings and sites).
